text: Apalya palanakartyaci krpa sodhanyata tumacyavara kasalahi gunha nahi. Jevha tumhi araphata (ya thikanapasuna) parata vhala, tevha masa'are harama (mujdalipha) javala allahace smarana kara ani asa prakare smarana kara, jase tyane tumhala sikavile ahe. Vastavika yapurvi tumhi margabhrasta lokammadhye hota
